text: The Bridge Charles Duncan O'Neal Bridge is a bridge in Bridgetown, Barbados. It is one of two bridges over the Careenage, the other being the Chamberlain Bridge, although unlike the Charles Duncan Bridge it does not take traffic. It is named after Charles Duncan O'Neal who founded the radical Democratic League in 1924. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Bridgetown Category:Bridges in Barbados
title: Charles Duncan O'Neal Bridge
